137    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton1ActionPerformed
138        JColorChooser chooser = new JColorChooser();
139        chooser.setChooserPanels(new AbstractColorChooserPanel[]{new SColorChooserPanel()});
140        showComponent(chooser);
141    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton1ActionPerformed

157
158    private void jButton5ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton5ActionPerformed
159        final int width = 20, height = 20;
160        TextCellFactory tcf = new TextCellFactory().font(new Font("Sans Serif", Font.BOLD, 18)).width(18).height(18);
161        final SquidPanel display = new SquidPanel(width, height, tcf, null);
162        final JPanel jp = new JPanel();
163        jp.setBackground(SColor.BLACK);
164        jp.add(display);
165
166        Thread t = new Thread(new Runnable() {
167            @Override
168            public void run() {
169                int x = 0, y = 1;
170                String input = "";
171                display.put(0, 0, "Type input please.");
172                display.refresh();
173                SquidKey keys = new SquidKey(true, SquidKey.CaptureType.TYPED);
174                jp.addKeyListener(keys);
175
176                while (true) {
177                    char c = keys.next().getKeyChar();
178                    if (c == '\n' || c == '\r') {//cover both windows and unix style line returns
179                        display.erase();
180                        display.refresh();
181                        display.put(0, 0, "Text: " + input);
182                        display.refresh();
183                        input = "";
184                        x = 0;
185                        y = 1;
186                    } else if (c == '\b') {//backspace character
187                        if (input.length() > 0) {
188                            input = input.substring(0, input.length() - 1);
189                        }
190                        if (x > 0) {
191                            x--;
192                        } else if (y > 1) {
193                            y--;
194                            x = width - 1;
195                        }
196
197                        display.put(x, y, ' ');//clear space
198                        display.refresh();
199                    } else {
200                        input += c;
201                        if (x >= width) {
202                            x = 0;
203                            y++;
204                        }
205
206                        if (y < height) {
207                            //everything's fine, print the character
208                            display.put(x, y, c);
209                            x++;
210                            display.refresh();
211                        }
212                    }
213                }
214
215            }
216        });
217        t.setDaemon(true);
218        t.start();
219
220        showComponent(jp);
221    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton5ActionPerformed
222
223    private void weightedLetterNamegenButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_weightedLetterNamegenButtonActionPerformed
224        showComponent(new NamegenPanel());
225    }//GEN-LAST:event_weightedLetterNamegenButtonActionPerformed

257
258    private void showComponent(JComponent comp) {
259        demoPanel.setViewportView(comp);
260        demoPanel.revalidate();
261        demoPanel.repaint();
262        comp.requestFocus();
263    }
